Comment.Language: For the Fast of Jonah or the Great Fast:

Text.Language: Sare V] w~li: m~mau n~ninobi n~te pilaoc: e~bol hiten pi~[lil: nem pic~yoi n~te pic~yoinoufi.
Wherein God takes away the sins of the people, through the burnt offering and the aroma of incense.
